issues.code: function stringToUint(string s) constant returns (uint result) { bytes memory b = bytes(s); uint i; result = 0; for (i = 0; i < b.length; i++) { uint c = uint(b[i]); if (c >= 48 && c <= 57) { result = result * 10 + (c - 48); } } }
issues.description:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `stringToUint(string)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
issues.title: Integer Overflow
